column1: Arcelia Ramírez (born 7 December 1967) is a Mexican actress. She has appeared in more than 50 films and television shows since 1985. She starred in the film Such Is Life
column2: which was screened in the Un Certain Regard section at the 2000 Cannes Film Festival.
